description:
Check the versions of the engines that are being used by the honeybee plugin.
This is useful for verifying that everything has been installed correctly
and that the versions of the engines are as expected.
-

outputs.name: lbt_gh
outputs.description: The version of Ladybug Tools for Grasshopper that is installed.

outputs.name: python
outputs.description: The version of Python used for Ladybug Tools CLI calls.

outputs.name: radiance
outputs.description:
The version of Radiance used by Ladybug Tools (will be None if
it is not installed).

outputs.name: openstudio
outputs.description:
The version of OpenStudio used by Ladybug Tools (will be None if
it is not installed).

outputs.name: energyplus
outputs.description:
The version of EnergyPlus used by Ladybug Tools (will be None if
it is not installed).

name: HB Check Versions
